indicator_name: 비감염인구 1천 명당 인체면역결핍바이러스(HIV) 신규 감염자 수(성, 연령 및 주요 인구특성별)
target_name: 2030년까지 후천성면역결핍증(AIDS), 결핵, 말라리아 및 소외열대질환의 확산을 종식시키고 간염, 수인성 질병 및 기타 전염성 질병 방지

en.target_name: By 2030, end the epidemics of AIDS, tuberculosis, malaria and neglected tropical diseases and combat hepatitis, water-borne diseases and other communicable diseases
en.computation_definitions:
National data (Type1)
This is the national produced statistics in the ROK that best corresponds to the definition of UN SDGs indicators.
Download the national metadata file for more information.
en.indicator_name: Number of new HIV infections per 1,000 uninfected population, by sex, age and key populations
en.indicator_definition: The annual number of new HIV infections
en.computation_calculations: Compiling reports from medical institutions(including public health centers), which should be filed with the integrated diseases and health management system within 24 hours whenever they give diagnosis and/or treat HIV/AIDS patients.
en.global_indicator_name: Number of new HIV infections per 1,000 uninfected population, by sex, age and key populations
en.graph_title: Proportion of population covered by social protection systems(The take-up rate of National Basic Living Security and Basic(Old-age) Pension)
en.source_organisation_1: Division of HIV/AIDS Prevention and Control, Korea Disease Control and Prevention Agency
en.title: Untitled
